talk.abstract: In high school science, we're taught to always include units in equations. Why not in scientific Python code? I'll show why and how to keep track of units in Python using real-world examples.
talk.description: In high school science, we're taught to always include units in equations. Why not in scientific Python code? I'll show why and how to keep track of units in Python using real-world examples.
talk.name: Writing self-documenting scientific code using physical quantities
talk.title: Writing self-documenting scientific code using physical quantities
